I don't understand it, I really want to learn to use it so I hope someone can help me.

@Milenotti

Well it will take some time to fully understand it (about 6 month - 1 year)...just play with FL and you will come across some things you don't know right now...

Visit www.warbeats.com for lot of tutorials and other stuff,i learned much from there...

Nexus is a plug-in which you have to buy or, since we're all here on piratebay, you can download it
Nexus is a great plug-in for all types of music,so it's considered one of the best plugins overall...

Hope it helps :D
Peace

Install Instructions:
1) Install the "flstudio_10.0.2" and on the last screen UNCHECK the checkbox that says "Run FL Studio"
2) Double click "flstudio_10.0.2_crack" and just keep clicking next or watever.
3)Don't worry about the other file that came with it. Your done now. Open up FL Studio ten from your desktop or start menu.
